author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
There's been a lot of talk of a project called XLibre as of late but there's another direction we could take in goal of keeping X11 desktops alive and that is being a very light compositor whose soul purpose is running a rootful environment, and that's what wayback does.
